commit.message:
syntax: allow bare sequences in lhs for follow checking

Closes #21350

+// Make sure that "bare sequences" don't ICE in follow checking
+
+macro_rules! bare {
+    $($id:expr),+ => ( $($id)+ )
+}

+fn main() { }
